title: This sturdy magnetic charging cable packs all the connections you need
description: Get the Statik 360 Pro multi-charging cable with swappable magnetic tips (USB-C, Lightning and Micro USB connections) for just $19.99. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: Get the Statik 360 Pro multi-charging cable with swappable magnetic tips (USB-C, Lightning and Micro USB connections) for just $19.99.
text: Daily deals Why carry six cables when one can handle all your connections? Photo: Cult of Mac Deals Sick of searching for the right cord with the proper connections to juice up your devices? The Statik 360 Pro is an all-in-one cable that can connect virtually anything. On one end of the multi-charging cable, you’ll find swappable magnetic tips that can handle USB-C, Lightning and Micro USB connections. On the other, you’ll find a USB-C connector as well as a built-in USB-A adapter. The magnetic head that attaches to the three tips swivels 360 degrees, so you won’t put strain on the cable or your devices. Plus, the Statik 360 Pro comes sheathed in braided nylon for maximum durability. The price for this convenient, 3-foot multi-charging cable is pretty special, too: just $19.99 (regularly $23). A multi-charging cable with every connection you’ll need While Apple already upgraded the iPhone (and almost all of its other products) to USB-C charging, every tech fan certainly owns older devices that require different connections. All in all, the Statik 360 Pro multi-charging cable offers six configurations to work with virtually any device. It can handle power delivery up to 100W and data transfers up to 480MB/s. If the magnetic tips that make this charger so convenient sound like something you’ll lose, don’t worry. You can safely store the tips in the included silicone organizer. It attaches directly to the cable to keep your options open. Serial phone-droppers, pay attention. This cable’s magnetic end works something like Apple’s MagSafe charging cables. That and its unique rotating design make it safer than your average cable. If a 3-footer doesn’t seem long enough, you’re in luck. This multi-charging cable also comes in a 6-foot variant for $21.99. Whether you need a short cable to connect without getting tangled in the car, a lengthy cord for travel, you’ve got options. Save on a do-it-all cable with USB-C, Lightning and Micro USB Get one master cord that can handle all your devices. Grab the Statik 360 Pro for just $19.99 (regularly $23). Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post about the Statik 360 Pro multi-charging cable on August 15, 2024. We updated the info.
html:
• Daily deals

Sick of searching for the right cord with the proper connections to juice up your devices? The Statik 360 Pro is an all-in-one cable that can connect virtually anything. On one end of the multi-charging cable, you’ll find swappable magnetic tips that can handle USB-C, Lightning and Micro USB connections. On the other, you’ll find a USB-C connector as well as a built-in USB-A adapter.

The magnetic head that attaches to the three tips swivels 360 degrees, so you won’t put strain on the cable or your devices. Plus, the Statik 360 Pro comes sheathed in braided nylon for maximum durability. The price for this convenient, 3-foot multi-charging cable is pretty special, too: just $19.99 (regularly $23).

A multi-charging cable with every connection you’ll need

While Apple already upgraded the iPhone (and almost all of its other products) to USB-C charging, every tech fan certainly owns older devices that require different connections. All in all, the Statik 360 Pro multi-charging cable offers six configurations to work with virtually any device. It can handle power delivery up to 100W and data transfers up to 480MB/s.

If the magnetic tips that make this charger so convenient sound like something you’ll lose, don’t worry. You can safely store the tips in the included silicone organizer. It attaches directly to the cable to keep your options open.

Serial phone-droppers, pay attention. This cable’s magnetic end works something like Apple’s MagSafe charging cables. That and its unique rotating design make it safer than your average cable.

If a 3-footer doesn’t seem long enough, you’re in luck. This multi-charging cable also comes in a 6-foot variant for $21.99. Whether you need a short cable to connect without getting tangled in the car, a lengthy cord for travel, you’ve got options.

Save on a do-it-all cable with USB-C, Lightning and Micro USB

Get one master cord that can handle all your devices. Grab the Statik 360 Pro for just $19.99 (regularly $23).

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post about the Statik 360 Pro multi-charging cable on August 15, 2024. We updated the info.
